title: GET_HELI_PITCH_CONTROL
content:
0x1944AC95// GetHeliPitchControl
float GET_HELI_PITCH_CONTROL(Vehicle heli);Parameters:heli: The helicopter to check.Returns: Returns a value representing the pitch control of the helicopter. The values range from -1.0 (nose down) to 1.0 (nose up), with 0.0 indicating no pitch input.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_HELI_PITCH_CONTROL
GetHeliPitchControl(vehicle)
